articles.title: 404 Not Found
articles.contents:
AndyCao
          Home
          About Me
          
          
          Past Projects
          
          
          Ongoing Projects
           
          ▾
          
          
          Forecasting
          Data Analytics
          Evolutionäre Persönlichkeitstheorie
          Risk Polarization Power Analysis
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              404 Not Found
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            As this page is most likely to be shown in the CDS
            “Cookies and R” session, I’ve prepared beforehand and
            replaced the picture of myself. Hopefully this picture of a
            cinnamon roll will do.
            I am a MSc student enrolled in psychology at the
            University of Basel, with a passion for statistics and
            datascience in general. Generally having a high amount of
            openness towards many kinds of topics, I like to explore on
            my own pace. Though I am also an unmovable object on topics
            which I dread. Luckily, the list is limited to a small
            amount.
            But as a psychologist, I know one should not take
            self-reports at face value… So I let the chess
            quote speak for itself:
            
            “There are 3 inevitable things in life: change, death,
            and Andy trying every opportunity possible to get involved
            with R and statistics”
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              404 Not Found

articles.title: AndyCao
articles.contents:
Disclaimer:
Before you dive into my humble webpage, I want to make one thing clear: please do not take the work here too seriously!
This website is my playground - a place where I experiment with code (and often break it!), share my subjective opinions on personal projects, and document my coding adventures during my time at the University of Basel.
So, buckle up and get ready to embark on a journey filled with silly ideas, playful experiments and pure chaos.
Warm regards,
Andy
